```lisp
(:action place
    :parameters (?p - agent ?item1 - object ?item2 - object ?container - object)
    :precondition (and (inventory ?p ?item1) (at ?p ?container) (or (empty ?container) (holding_flour_and_salt ?container)) (or (not (flattened ?item1)) (inventory ?p ?item2)))
    :effect (and (or (holding_flour_and_salt ?container) (flattened ?item1) (mixed_with_oil ?container) (on_wax_paper ?item1)))
)

(:action remove
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?item - object ?container - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?agent ?container) (in_container ?item ?container))
    :effect (and (not (in_container ?item ?container)))
)

(:action press
    :parameters (?p - agent ?item - object ?surface - surface)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?item) (prepared ?item) (at ?p ?surface))
    :effect (and (pressed ?item ?surface) (not (prepared ?item)))
)

(:action create_edge_with_fork
    :parameters (?p - agent ?pastry - dough ?fork - utensil)
    :precondition (and (in_pie_dish ?pastry) (inventory ?p ?fork) (at ?p ?pastry))
    :effect (edged_with_fork ?pastry)
)

(:action create
    :parameters (?p - agent ?item - object ?tool - object)
    :precondition (and (inventory ?p ?tool) (at ?p ?item) (not (created ?item)))
    :effect (created ?item)
)

(:action create
    :parameters (?p - agent ?pastry - dough ?fork - utensil)
    :precondition (and (inventory ?p ?fork) (at ?p ?pastry) (not (created ?pastry)))
    :effect (created ?pastry)
)

(:action create
    :parameters (?p - agent ?bookshelf - furniture ?screwdriver - tool)
    :precondition (and (inventory ?p ?screwdriver) (at ?p ?bookshelf) (not (created ?bookshelf)))
    :effect (created ?bookshelf)
)
```
